section.p: 'Hah!' shouts the lord, overjoyed. 'That is a request I do not have to grant after the twenty-third holy decree of the seventeenth Faceless King, made seven hundred and thirty-six years ago! And you cannot make more than one request of me! Excellent!'
You can do nothing but leave, musing about the strange customs of the Uttakin.
You go back to the Cathedral of Ebron, purified but no wiser. .
